Seventeen years ago, Larry Page teamed up with Sergey Brin to launch Google.
Now, he's busy pushing two teams of engineers to launch cars into the sky.
Page has been quietly bankrolling two separate California companies...
The first, Zee.Aero, set up shop right next to Google headquarters...
Kitty Hawk came along a few years later...
...and opened their offices a few blocks away.
To date, Page has reportedly pumped about 100 million dollars of his personal fortune...
